app.title: Lee Dongwon - Interactive Portfolio
app.description: Portfolio of Lee Dongwon - Full Stack Engineer with 2 years of experience in React, Python, and cloud technologies

hero.name: Lee Dongwon
hero.subtitle: Building scalable web applications with modern technologies

bio.line1: A passionate Full Stack Engineer with 2 years of experience
bio.line2: I specialize in creating elegant solutions to complex problems,
bio.line3: turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code.

about.title: About Me
about.user_centered_desc: With 2 years of professional experience, I've grown from a junior developer to a confident engineer capable of owning features end-to-end. My focus is on creating scalable, user-friendly applications.
about.proactivity_desc: Self-taught TypeScript, cloud infrastructure, and modern DevOps practices. Active contributor to open-source projects and regularly attend tech meetups to stay current with industry trends.
about.responsibility_desc: Successfully delivered 15+ features from conception to production. Reduced bug reports by 60% through comprehensive testing strategies and maintained 99.9% uptime for critical services.
about.customer_oriented_desc: Strong communication skills developed through cross-functional collaboration. Active participant in code reviews and contributed to improving team development processes.

work.title: Work Experience
work.nextbeat_desc: Working as a Full Stack Engineer at Hoikushi Bank! (保育士バンク！). Developing with Svelte/SvelteKit, Nest.js, and Scala.

projects.title: Projects
projects.seat_assignment_system: Restaurant Recommendation Map - Location-based discovery app with personalized recommendations and real-time reviews
projects.crypto_chart_viewer: Restaurant Data Web Scraper - Automated data pipeline processing 10K+ restaurants monthly with Python
